mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_cost(N, K, A):
    no = 0
    mn = float('inf')
    arr = [[0, 0]]
    for i in range(N):
        if A[i] == 1:
            no += 1
        x = arr[-1][:]
        x[A[i]] += 1
        arr.append(x)
        if i + 1 >= K:
            z = arr[-1][1] - arr[i - K + 1][1]
            mn = min(z, mn)
    ans = mn * (1 + mn) // 2
    no += mn
    ans += no
    return ans

        arr.append(x)
        if i + 1 >= K:
            z = arr[-1][1] - arr[i - K + 1][1]
            mn = min(z, mn)
    ans = mn * (1 + mn) // 2
    no -= mn
    ans -= no
    return ans

            z = arr[-1][1] - arr[i - K + 1][1]
            mn = min(z, mn)
    ans = mn * (1 + mn) // 2
    no -= mn
    ans += no
    return ans
